On the cover

The big noise this year has been from President Donald Trump. But China proved its strengths in 2025, and Mr Trump helped: leader, page 15. In a year of turmoil, some places got better. Our country of the year: leader, page 16. A Well informed guide to surviving Christmas: leader, page 20. Updates from Gaza, page 36, and Ukraine, page 39. How to rescue Novo Nordisk, page 54. Who were the Denisovans? Page 66. Plus 54 pages of festive delights...
